#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,ans1,ans2,cut;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ans1=0;ans2=0;
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
        ans1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
        if((max(x1,x3)>=min(x2,x4))||(max(y1,y3)>=min(y2,y4)))
        {
            cut=0;
        }
        else
        {
            cut=(min(x2,x4)-max(x1,x3))*((min(y2,y4)-max(y1,y3)));
        }
        ans2=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
        cout<<ans2+ans1-cut<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
